00016 {
00017     BundleTask.apply(this, arguments);
00018

00020     this._keyedThemes = [];

00061 BlendTask.prototype.defineThemeDescriptorTasks = function()
00062 {
00063     this.flattenedEnvironments().forEach(function(anEnvironment)
00064     {
00065         var folder = anEnvironment.name() + ".environment",
00066             themeDescriptors = this.themeDescriptors(),
00067             resourcesPath = this.resourcesPath(),
00068             intermediatesPath = FILE.join(this.buildIntermediatesProductPath(), folder, "Resources"),
00069             staticPath = this.buildProductStaticPathForEnvironment(anEnvironment),
00070             keyedThemes = this._keyedThemes,
00071             themesTaskName = this.name() + ":themes";
00072 
00073         this.enhance(themesTaskName);
00074 
00075         objj_import(themeDescriptors.toArray(), YES, function()
00076         {
00077             [BKThemeDescriptor allThemeDescriptorClasses].forEach(function(aClass)
00078             {
00079                 var keyedThemePath = FILE.join(intermediatesPath, [aClass themeName] + ".keyedtheme");
00080 
00081                 filedir (keyedThemePath, themesTaskName);
00082                 filedir (staticPath, [keyedThemePath]);
00083 
00084                 keyedThemes.push([aClass themeName] + ".keyedtheme");
00085             });
00086         });
00087 
00088         require("browser/timeout").serviceTimeouts();
00089 
00090         task (themesTaskName, function()
00091         {
00092             [BKThemeDescriptor allThemeDescriptorClasses].forEach(function(aClass)
00093             {
00094                 var themeTemplate = [[BKThemeTemplate alloc] init];
00095 
00096                 [themeTemplate setValue:[aClass themeName] forKey:@"name"];
00097 
00098                 var objectTemplates = [aClass themedObjectTemplates],
00099                     data = cibDataFromTopLevelObjects(objectTemplates.concat([themeTemplate])),
00100                     fileContents = themeFromCibData(data);
00101 
00102                 // No filedir in this case, so we have to make it ourselves.
00103                 FILE.mkdirs(intermediatesPath);
00104                 FILE.write(FILE.join(intermediatesPath, [aClass themeName] + ".keyedtheme"), MARKER_TEXT + ";" + fileContents.length + ";" + fileContents, { charset:"UTF-8" });
00105             });
00106         });
00107     }, this);
00108 }
00109 
00110 function cibDataFromTopLevelObjects(objects)
00111 {
00112     var data = [CPData data],
00113         archiver = [[CPKeyedArchiver alloc] initForWritingWithMutableData:data],
00114         objectData = [[_CPCibObjectData alloc] init];
00115 
00116     objectData._fileOwner = [_CPCibCustomObject new];
00117     objectData._fileOwner._className = @"CPObject";
00118 
00119     var index = 0,
00120         count = objects.length;
00121 
00122     for (; index < count; ++index)
00123     {
00124         objectData._objectsValues[index] = objectData._fileOwner;
00125         objectData._objectsKeys[index] = objects[index];
00126     }
00127 
00128     [archiver encodeObject:objectData forKey:@"CPCibObjectDataKey"];
00129 
00130     [archiver finishEncoding];
00131 
00132     return data;
00133 }
00134 
00135 function themeFromCibData(data)
00136 {
00137     var cib = [[CPCib alloc] initWithData:data],
00138         topLevelObjects = [];
00139 
00140     [cib _setAwakenCustomResources:NO];
00141     [cib instantiateCibWithExternalNameTable:[CPDictionary dictionaryWithObject:topLevelObjects forKey:CPCibTopLevelObjects]];
00142 
00143     var count = topLevelObjects.length,
00144         theme = nil,
00145         templates = [];
00146 
00147     while (count--)
00148     {
00149         var object = topLevelObjects[count];
00150 
00151         templates = templates.concat([object blendThemeObjectTemplates]);
00152 
00153         if ([object isKindOfClass:[BKThemeTemplate class]])
00154             theme = [[CPTheme alloc] initWithName:[object valueForKey:@"name"]];
00155     }
00156 
00157     TERM.stream.print("Building \0green(" + [theme name] + "\0) theme");
00158 
00159     [templates makeObjectsPerformSelector:@selector(blendAddThemedObjectAttributesToTheme:) withObject:theme];
00160 
00161     return [[CPKeyedArchiver archivedDataWithRootObject:theme] string];
00162 }

00178 @implementation CPObject (BlendAdditions)
00179 
00180 - (CPArray)blendThemeObjectTemplates
00181 {
00182     var theClass = [self class];
00183 
00184     if ([theClass isKindOfClass:[BKThemedObjectTemplate class]])
00185         return [self];
00186 
00187     if ([theClass isKindOfClass:[CPView class]])
00188     {
00189         var templates = [],
00190             subviews = [self subviews],
00191             count = [subviews count];
00192 
00193         while (count--)
00194             templates = templates.concat([subviews[count] blendThemeObjectTemplates]);
00195 
00196         return templates;
00197     }
00198 
00199     return [];
00200 }
00201 
00202 @end
00203 
00204 @implementation BKThemedObjectTemplate (BlendAdditions)
00205 
00206 - (void)blendAddThemedObjectAttributesToTheme:(CPTheme)aTheme
00207 {
00208     var themedObject = [self valueForKey:@"themedObject"];
00209 
00210     if (!themedObject)
00211     {
00212         var subviews = [self subviews];
00213 
00214         if ([subviews count] > 0)
00215             themedObject = subviews[0];
00216     }
00217 
00218     if (themedObject)
00219     {
00220         TERM.stream.print(" Recording themed properties for \0purple(" + [themedObject className] + "\0).");
00221 
00222         [aTheme takeThemeFromObject:themedObject];
00223     }
00224 }

00230 exports.blend = function(aName, aFunction)

00232     // No .apply necessary because the parameters aren't variable.
